section.title: The First Product Overview
section.para: It provides an overview on product catalog, product category, and product which is the first one of your organization. You will be able to create product catalog, product category, and product for your organization and also be able to create order by that product.

section.title: How to create product
section.para: 1. When an organization is created , go to "First Product" tab button. You will see the screen for create/update product catalog, enter Catalog [ID] and Catalog Name , click "Update" and then product catalog is created.

2. Go to "Category" tab button near "Product Catalog", You will see the screen for create/update product category, enter Product Category Id, Category Name and Product Description , click "Update" and then product category is created.

3. Go to "Product" tab button near "Category", You will see the screen for create/update product, enter Product Id, Internal Name, Product Name, Short Description , Default Price, and Average Cost then click "Create Product" and then product is created.
